QuestData.Title: Forbidden Knowledge
QuestData.Description: <Darkscryer Raastok narrows his eyes and looks you up and down.>$B$BSo, you are Iskar's hired hand? Well, I care not whether you are |5$r or an overgrown moth, so long as you are willing to help.$B$BThe Adherents of Rukhmar are closed-minded fools! They forbid the study of shadow magic, branding as heretics anyone who dares to seek answers in the dark.$B$BWe kept many tomes of forbidden knowledge in Veil Shadar. Bring any you find to me, and I will reward you for keeping them from the flames.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover 6 Shadow Tomes from Veil Shadar.
QuestData.CompletionText: What kind of sick individual burns a book full of perfectly good dark arts?!
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, yes. Excellent work, these are some of my favorites.$B$BKnowledge is power, and now I can leave for the spires feeling well-armed.
